1604066235_mirrored_q158073378252010_git.body: I want to know if this feature is implemented?@HelloZeroNet

> Not yet, but added to todo list

It is a bit cumbersome to configure the ssl certificate for the second-level domain name.
Thank you for your reply. I look forward to the completion of this feature.

1604066506_mirrored_monkey000_github.body: 发现原因了 是因为Tampermonkey启用了[去除电信运营商劫持广告](https://greasyfork.org/zh-CN/scripts/30422-%E5%8E%BB%E9%99%A4%E7%94%B5%E4%BF%A1%E8%BF%90%E8%90%A5%E5%95%86%E5%8A%AB%E6%8C%81%E5%B9%BF%E5%91%8A)

topic.title: 总是弹框提示“检测到劫持广告！”
